data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bruce, A. J. (2014): Nippontonia ashmoreiensis sp. nov., (Crustacea: Decapoda, Pontoniinae) from Ashmore Reef, Western Australia. Zootaxa 3847 (3): 437-445, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3847.3.8
